Taṃ pana samappavattamodanaṃ upamāya dassetuṃ ‘‘sītodakaṃ viyā’’tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha sammoditanti saṃsanditaṃ ekībhāvanti sammodanakiriyāya samānataṃ ekarūpataṃ, khamanīyanti ‘‘idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ, kacci khamituṃ sakkuṇeyya’’nti pucchati. Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirapabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ. Sīsarogādiābādhābhāvena kacci appābādhaṃ. Dukkhajīvikābhāvena kacci appātaṅkaṃ. Taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ. Tadanurūpabalayogato kacci balaṃ. Sukhavihārasambhavena kacci phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kacci-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Saritabbabhāvatoti anussaritabbabhāvato. ‘‘Saraṇīya’’nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā ‘‘sāraṇīya’’nti vuttaṃ.
